activities: INTELLIGENCE-NET OFFICE provides consulting services in the biotechnology industry sector, in particular: biotechnology consultation, business consultation, business investigation (intelligence information), market research and analysis, product development consultation. Our products are represented essentially by knowledge, starting from the disparate nature of the information sources, and filtered through an intelligence interpretation process: (i) technical reports ad hoc prepared (or a targeted investigation) for the purpose of problem solving and decision making, (ii) a reconnaissance search or study (broad surveillance scouting). The products are transferred very quickly to clients for critical and complex decisions. We offer gateways to critical informations. INTELLIGENCE-NET OFFICE, as intelligence outsource provider, is developing business relationships with public and private European organizations. We are concerned about keeping sensitive information private and defending the network perimeter defined by the company itself and its business partners. Our policy at this regard is reported on the website.
